overview: Girls just wanna have fun, right? In Hot Showers #9 director Clive McLean shows us how beautiful young babes go about having a good time. First, the nubile tramps moisten their muffin. A steamy shower, a squirt with a hose or a dip in the pool will do, so long as their tight little twats are slick and ready for action. Next, they call some girlfriends. The cuter the better. Finally, the action begins. Clits swell, muffs are munched and holes are crammed with anything that will fit. If you're into dripping, all-girl parties, Hot Showers #9 is a real blast!
title: Hot Showers 9
